ERROR_BASE: Visual Notifications has detected a configuration error.
ERROR_HEADER: Delete the header entry from your configuration. This module does not need it. (You can view the docs!)
ERROR_POSITION: For this module to work properly, you need to set the position to fullscreen_above. (You can view the docs!)
ERROR_CUSTOM: There was an error parsing the custom notifications types. Check for spelling errors.
PAYLOAD_MALFORMED: A malformed notification has been received, you can see it in the logs.
